name: Shoreline Aviation
about: Shoreline Aviation, Inc., an FAA approved Part 61 Flight School, has been providing first-class aviation services since 1981. Located at Marshfield Municipal Airport in Massachusetts, we offer flight training for students and pilots of all ages and experience levels. Our experienced instructors provide customized training programs, including private pilot certificates, instrument ratings, and commercial licenses. We operate a fleet of Piper Warriors and a DA-42 Diamond Twinstar, all maintained by our on-site authorized Piper Service Center. Open seven days a week, our services also include aircraft sales, management, charter, and maintenance. With a focus on safety and personalized service, Shoreline Aviation is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals. Contact us today to start your flying journey.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
